name: Astronoids
description:
Made by Eric & Roger

Want to test your habilities on games? 

What will be the higest score you'll be able to reach?

Try it now and enjoy.

Description:

Astronoids is a variant of the classic game Space Shooter.

It is part of a school project, made using Unity.

This game is a work in progress (WIP) and bugs may happen.

Controls:

W, A, S, D --> Move

Left Contol --> Shoot

Esc --> Pause/Unpause
